verses.verse: Furthermore <S%H453>Elihu<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H4405>words,<s%> O you <S%H2450>wise<s%> men; and give <S%H238>ear<s%> to me, you that have <S%H3045>knowledge.<s%>
For the <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H974>tries<s%> <S%H4405>words,<s%> as the <S%H2441>mouth<s%> <S%H2938>tastes<s%> <S%H398>meat.<s%>
Let us <S%H977>choose<s%> to us <S%H4941>judgment:<s%> let us <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> ourselves <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H2896>good.<s%>
For <S%H347>Job<s%> has <S%H559>said,<s%> I am <S%H6663>righteous:<s%> and <S%H410>God<s%> has <S%H5493>taken<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> my <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
Should I <S%H3576>lie<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> my <S%H4941>right?<s%> my <S%H2671>wound<s%> is <S%H605>incurable<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H6588>transgression.<s%>
<S%H4310>What<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> is like <S%H347>Job,<s%> who <S%H8354>drinks<s%> up <S%H3933>scorning<s%> like <S%H4325>water?<s%>
Which <S%H732>goes<s%> in <S%H2274>company<s%> with the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H3212>walks<s%> with <S%H7562>wicked<s%> <S%H582>men.<s%>
For he has <S%H559>said,<s%> It <S%H5532>profits<s%> a <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> that he should <S%H7521>delight<s%> himself with <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me you <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3824>understanding:<s%> <S%H2486>far<s%> be it from <S%H410>God,<s%> that he should do <S%H7562>wickedness;<s%> and from the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> that he should commit <S%H5766>iniquity.<s%>
For the <S%H6467>work<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> shall he <S%H7999>render<s%> to him, and cause every <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H4672>find<s%> according to his <S%H734>ways.<s%>
<S%H637>Yes,<s%> <S%H551>surely<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> will not do <S%H7561>wickedly,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H5791>pervert<s%> <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> has given him a <S%H6485>charge<s%> over the <S%H776>earth?<s%> or <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H7760>disposed<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8398>world?<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> he <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> on man, if he <S%H622>gather<s%> to himself his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> and his <S%H5397>breath;<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H1478>perish<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> and <S%H120>man<s%> shall <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> now you have <S%H998>understanding,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H2063>this:<s%> <S%H238>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H4405>words.<s%>
Shall <S%H637>even<s%> he that <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H4941>right<s%> <S%H2280>govern?<s%> and will you <S%H7561>condemn<s%> him that is <S%H3524>most<s%> <S%H6662>just?<s%>
Is it fit to <S%H559>say<s%> to a <S%H4428>king,<s%> You are <S%H1100>wicked?<s%> and to <S%H5081>princes,<s%> You are <S%H7563>ungodly?<s%>

<S%H834>How<s%> much less to him that <S%H5375>accepts<s%> not the <S%H6440>persons<s%> of <S%H8269>princes,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5234>regards<s%> the <S%H7771>rich<s%> <S%H6440>more<s%> <S%H6440>than<s%> the <S%H1800>poor?<s%> for they <S%H3605>all<s%> are the <S%H4639>work<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

In a <S%H7281>moment<s%> shall they <S%H4191>die,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be <S%H1607>troubled<s%> at <S%H2676>midnight,<s%> <S%H3915><s%> and <S%H5674>pass<s%> away: and the <S%H47>mighty<s%> shall be <S%H5493>taken<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
For his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are on the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H376>man,<s%> and he <S%H7200>sees<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H6806>goings.<s%>

There is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death,<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> may <S%H5641>hide<s%> themselves.
For he will not <S%H7760>lay<s%> on <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> than right; that he should <S%H1980>enter<s%> into <S%H4941>judgment<s%> with <S%H410>God.<s%>
He shall <S%H7489>break<s%> in pieces <S%H3524>mighty<s%> men <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H2714>number,<s%> and <S%H5975>set<s%> <S%H312>others<s%> in their <S%H8478>stead.<s%>
<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> he <S%H5234>knows<s%> their <S%H4566>works,<s%> and he <S%H2015>overturns<s%> them in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> so that they are <S%H1792>destroyed.<s%>
He <S%H5606>strikes<s%> them as <S%H7563>wicked<s%> men in the <S%H4725>open<s%> <S%H7200>sight<s%> of others;
<S%H834>Because<s%> they <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>back<s%> from him, and would not <S%H7919>consider<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of his <S%H1870>ways:<s%>
So that they cause the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to him, and he <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted.<s%>

When he gives <S%H8252>quietness,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> then can make <S%H7561>trouble?<s%> and when he <S%H5641>hides<s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> then can <S%H7789>behold<s%> him? whether it be done <S%H5921>against<s%> a <S%H1471>nation,<s%> or <S%H5921>against<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3162>only:<s%>
That the <S%H120>hypocrite<s%> <S%H2611><s%> <S%H4427>reign<s%> not, lest the <S%H5971>people<s%> be <S%H4170>ensnared.<s%>
<S%H3588>Surely<s%> it is meet to be <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H410>God,<s%> I have <S%H5375>borne<s%> chastisement, I will not <S%H2254>offend<s%> any more:
That which I <S%H2372>see<s%> not <S%H3384>teach<s%> you me: <S%H518>if<s%> I have <S%H6466>done<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> I will <S%H6466>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> more.

Should it be according to your <S%H5973>mind?<s%> he will <S%H7999>recompense<s%> it, <S%H3588>whether<s%> you <S%H3988>refuse,<s%> or <S%H3588>whether<s%> you <S%H977>choose;<s%> and not I: therefore <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> you <S%H3045>know.<s%>
Let <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3824>understanding<s%> <S%H559>tell<s%> me, and let a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me.
<S%H347>Job<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and his <S%H1697>words<s%> were <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H7919>wisdom.<s%>
My <S%H15>desire<s%> is that <S%H347>Job<s%> may be <S%H974>tried<s%> to the <S%H5331>end<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of his <S%H8666>answers<s%> for <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H582>men.<s%>

For he <S%H3254>adds<s%> <S%H6588>rebellion<s%> to his <S%H2403>sin,<s%> he <S%H5606>clapps<s%> his hands <S%H996>among<s%> us, and <S%H7235>multiplies<s%> his <S%H561>words<s%> against <S%H410>God.<s%>
